description: Pre-built RTI application templates for animal welfare and food safety transparency

templates.name: AWBI Slaughterhouse Inspection Reports
templates.description: Inspection records of registered and unregistered slaughterhouses
records: Inspection reports of slaughterhouses conducted or commissioned by the Animal Welfare Board of India, including compliance with the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (Slaughter House) Rules, 2001
List of slaughterhouses registered with local municipal bodies and their inspection status
Complaints received by AWBI regarding illegal or inhumane slaughterhouse operations and actions taken thereon
Compliance status with Food Safety and Standards (Licensing and Registration of Food Businesses) Regulation, 2011 for meat processing units

templates.name: AWBI Animal Birth Control Programme Data
templates.description: Data on the Animal Birth Control programme for stray dogs
records: State-wise and city-wise data on the number of sterilizations performed under the Animal Birth Control (Dogs) Rules, 2001, as amended in 2023
Grants disbursed to Animal Welfare Organizations (AWOs) for ABC implementation
Monitoring and evaluation reports of ABC programmes in metropolitan areas
Complaints received against AWOs regarding ABC programme implementation

templates.name: FSSAI Meat Processing Facility Licensing
templates.description: Licensing and inspection data for meat and dairy processing facilities
records: State-wise list of licensed meat processing facilities under FSSAI, including license category and processing capacity
Inspection reports of meat processing units, with details of non-compliance found
Antibiotic residue testing data in meat and dairy products sold in Indian markets
Actions taken against unlicensed or non-compliant meat and dairy processing units
Results of surveillance sampling for microbiological contamination in meat products

templates.name: FSSAI Dairy Adulteration Surveillance
templates.description: Milk and dairy product adulteration testing data
records: Results of the National Milk Quality Survey and any subsequent surveys conducted by FSSAI
State-wise data on milk adulteration cases detected, type of adulterant found, and enforcement actions taken
Aflatoxin M1 contamination data in milk and dairy products
Antibiotic residue testing results in milk samples collected from dairy cooperatives and private processors

templates.name: CPCB Slaughterhouse and Tannery Pollution
templates.description: Pollution data from slaughterhouses and tanneries
records: List of slaughterhouses and tanneries classified as grossly polluting industries under the CPCB categorization
Effluent monitoring data for slaughterhouses and tanneries, including BOD, COD, and TSS measurements
Consent-to-operate status and compliance records for slaughterhouses in major cities
Show-cause notices and closure directions issued to non-compliant slaughterhouses and tanneries
Environmental compensation levied on polluting slaughterhouses and tanneries

templates.name: Department of Animal Husbandry Livestock Census Data
templates.description: Detailed livestock census and scheme data
records: District-wise detailed data from the 20th Livestock Census (2019) and any subsequent census, including species breakdown, breed-wise data, and ownership patterns
Beneficiary data for National Livestock Mission schemes, state-wise and district-wise
Subsidy disbursements under the Dairy Development schemes (NDP, DEDS)
Poultry development scheme expenditure and beneficiary data
Pig development scheme implementation data and expenditure by state

templates.name: Department of Animal Husbandry Disease Outbreak Data
templates.description: Animal disease surveillance and outbreak response data
records: State-wise and district-wise data on avian influenza (bird flu) outbreaks, including number of birds culled and compensation paid
Foot-and-mouth disease (FMD) outbreak data and vaccination coverage under the FMD Control Programme
Brucellosis prevalence data in cattle and buffalo populations
African Swine Fever outbreak data and containment measures
National Animal Disease Reporting System (NADRS) data submissions by states

templates.name: MoEFCC Environmental Clearances for Livestock Facilities
templates.description: Environmental impact assessments for large-scale animal operations
records: Environmental clearance applications and decisions for large-scale poultry farms, dairy farms, and animal husbandry projects under the EIA Notification 2006
Environment Impact Assessment reports prepared for animal agriculture projects
Conditions imposed in environmental clearances for livestock-related projects and compliance monitoring reports
Public hearing proceedings for proposed large-scale animal agriculture projects

templates.name: State Pollution Control Board â€” Large Farm Compliance
templates.description: State-level compliance data for intensive animal farming operations
records: List of intensive poultry, dairy, and pig farming operations that have obtained consent-to-establish and consent-to-operate from the State Pollution Control Board
Pollution monitoring data (air, water, soil) for areas surrounding intensive animal farming operations
Complaints received from local communities regarding pollution from animal farming operations and actions taken
Show-cause and closure notices issued to animal farming operations for environmental violations

templates.name: AWBI Performing Animal Registration
templates.description: Registration and inspection data for performing and captive animals
records: List of registered performing animal establishments under the Performing Animals (Registration) Rules, 2001
Inspection reports of circuses, zoos, and other facilities using performing animals
Complaints received regarding cruelty to performing animals and investigations conducted
Registration applications rejected or revoked and reasons therefor
Data on elephants held in captivity, including ownership transfer records and health assessments

templates.name: APEDA Meat Export Data
templates.description: Meat and animal product export data and registered units
records: Country-wise and product-wise export data for meat (buffalo, sheep/goat, poultry) and animal products
List of APEDA-registered meat processing and export units with capacity and location details
Inspection and compliance reports for registered meat export units
Traceability system implementation data for exported animal products
Rejections or detentions of Indian meat/animal product shipments by importing countries and reasons therefor
